name: Reclamation of the Soul
description:
Soul Knight was a on a nice stroll one day when suddenly he was attacked and brainwashed to kill his friends. Now he must go on a quest to not only revive his friends, but to find something else entirely- his own soul.

This game is a 5 level platformer where you must run and jump throughout a variety of obstacles to reach your friends and save them. The theme of this game is redemption, as you must redeem yourself for the actions you have done and the game play and backgrounds in the game reflect that. As you keep going on through the game, Soul Knight gets a little part of his soul back through every level and as such runs faster and jumps higher with every passing level. 

Reclamation of the Soul Credits-

Creator/Designer- Lajeeth Thangavel

Mechanics code created by Michael Baker - University of Texas at Austin

Assets used- Flat Platformer Template, Painted HQ  2D Forest Medival Background, Parallax Dusk Mountain Background Artwork, Red Cliff Background, and Stylized Nature Platform Set.
